articles.title: Trump classified documents trial set for May 2024
articles.description: A federal judge has set a May 20th, 2024 start date for the trial of former U.S. President Donald Trump over his alleged mishandling of classified documents. Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Rick Newman explains "these are very serious charges and the case against Trump appears to be very strong." Newman details how a potential conviction could impact the Trump campaign and Republican Primary.
